org.elasticsearch.transport

Class TransportMessage<TM extends TransportMessage<TM>>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.elasticsearch.common.ContextHolder
      • org.elasticsearch.transport.TransportMessage<TM>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Streamable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    TransportRequest, TransportResponse

    public abstract class TransportMessage<TM extends TransportMessage<TM>>
extends ContextHolder
implements Streamable
    The transport message is also a context holder that holds transient context, that is, the context is not serialized with message.
